title: Honda and Acura Sales Stumble In August, Prologue Shines Bright
description: Both new and used vehicle prices have risen rather quickly over the past four years, and they’re showing no signs of stopping. While Honda and Acura’s sales weren’t anything to write home about in August, their year-to-date (YTD) numbers prove that the Japanese automaker is still bringing plenty of ...
titleSummary: Honda Brands Suffer Slump, But New Prologue Model Steals Spotlight
descriptionSummary: Vehicle prices have escalated sharply over the past four years, with no slowdown in sight. Despite sluggish sales for Honda and Acura in August, their year-to-date figures indicate a strong performance from the Japanese brand so far.

title: Automotive Journalists Save Puppies! What is Operation Frodo?
description: Operation Frodo is more than a road trip; it’s part of a growing effort to rescue dogs from uncertain futures and deliver them to loving homes thousands of miles away. Along the journey, volunteers get the added joy of connecting with (and cuddling with) the pups while helping save lives. For the ...
titleSummary: "Auto Writers Join Forces to Rescue 10 Distressed Pups in Daring 'Operation Frodo' Mission"
descriptionSummary: A thousand-mile odyssey, Operation Frodo brings hope to desperate dogs by transporting them to forever homes across vast distances, offering a second chance at love and companionship along the way.

title: Stellantis Cans Fully-Electric Ram 1500 Due To Slow Demand
description: In a new statement, Stellantis, the parent company of storied American car brands including Chrysler, Dodge, Jeep, and Ram Trucks, says that it will indefinitely cease development and plans to introduce an all-electric Ram 1500 pickup truck to market. The automaker cites that the decision was made ...
titleSummary: "Ram 1500 EV Axed Amid Lackluster Sales"
descriptionSummary: Stellantis, the parent company behind iconic US brands like Chrysler, Dodge, Jeep, and Ram Trucks, has abruptly ended work on a proposed all-electric Ram 1500 model, opting against its market introduction indefinitely due to unannounced reasons.

title: Toyota, Lexus, And Subaru Are All Wrapped Up In A 100,000 EV Recall
description: Toyota, Lexus, and Subaru have issued a recall covering nearly 100,000 EVs the trio of OEMs have developed together: the Toyota bZ, the Subaru Solterra, and the Lexus RZ. The issue stems from something relatively minor, thankfully, but it has resulted in a stop-sale order while the Japanese ...
titleSummary: "Three Japanese Automakers Face Massive Electric Vehicle Safety Crisis"
descriptionSummary: A joint recall affects over 90,000 electric vehicles produced by Toyota, Lexus, and Subaru, including the Toyota bZ4X, Solterra, and RZ models. A minor issue has prompted a halt on new sales until the problem can be addressed.

title: America Never Gets The Cool Stuff: Toyota Land Cruiser GR Sport Rally Raid Debuts
description: Overseas in Japan, Toyota owns a subsidiary called Toyota Auto Body. As the name suggests, the subsidiary does some work upfitting new Toyota models like the Land Cruiser. And its latest creation is the Rally Raid special edition for the Japanese market Land Cruiser GR Sport that celebrates the ...
titleSummary: US Buyers Miss Out on Latest Off-Road Thrill as Toyota Unveils Land Cruiser GR Sport Rally Raid
descriptionSummary: In Japan, Toyota's subsidiary Toyota Auto Body crafts bespoke upgrades for select Toyota vehicles, such as the rugged Land Cruiser. Their latest collaboration results in a limited-edition GR Sport variant, tailored to thrill local off-road enthusiasts.

title: Ferrari’s Tribute to America After 9/11 Remains One of F1’s Most Powerful Gestures
description: September 11, 2001 shocked the world far beyond America’s borders. Just five days later, at the Italian Grand Prix in Monza, Ferrari used its Formula 1 cars to deliver a silent yet powerful gesture of solidarity. Michael Schumacher and Rubens Barrichello raced in all-red cars stripped of sponsor ...
titleSummary: Ferrari's Emotional Post-9/11 Tribute Still Resonates in Formula One Circles
descriptionSummary: On September 11, 2001, global shockwaves extended far beyond America's shores. Five days later, at the Italian Grand Prix, Ferrari used its Formula 1 cars as a poignant tribute to solidarity, racing in all-red vehicles devoid of sponsorship decals.

title: BMW Design Boss Defends Giant Grilles: “China Wants Them”
description: Adrian van Hooydonk, BMW's head of design since 2009, has weathered years of criticism over the brand's increasingly controversial grille designs. From the polarizing X7 to the massive 7 Series kidney grilles, BMW design has sparked fierce online debates. The first Neue Klasse model, the 2026 BMW ...
titleSummary: "BMW Designer Stands Firm on Big Grilles: China's Influence Takes Center Stage"
descriptionSummary: BMW Design Chief Adrian van Hooydonk faces ongoing backlash for bold new grille styles, which have ignited heated debates over the brand's aesthetic direction since his tenure began in 2009, with models like the X7 and 7 Series at center stage. The 2026 BMW Neue Klasse model is a pivotal test case.

title: Nissan Faces a Bumpy Road to Recovery
description: Nissan’s new CEO has initiated aggressive reforms as he seeks to right the ship, but the automaker faces a tough road ahead as sales remain slow and global competition heats up. CEO Ivan Espinosa’s plans could cost Nissan billions, and the company’s success is anything but guaranteed. A Nissan ...
titleSummary: Nissan's Path to Redemption Hits Rough Terrain
descriptionSummary: Nissan's new leadership has embarked on a bold turnaround strategy to revitalize the company, but its progress will be put to the test as it navigates sluggish sales and intensifying global competition amidst significant investment risks.

title: 2005 Porsche Carrera GT for Sale With 1,800 Miles
description: Few cars capture the essence of a pure driver’s machine like the Porsche Carrera GT. Built between 2003 and 2007 in a run of just 1,270 units, it combined a motorsport-derived 5.7-liter V10 with a carbon-fiber chassis and a six-speed manual. With 605 horsepower, a 0-60 mph sprint of 3.5 seconds, ...
titleSummary: Rare 2005 Porsche Speedster Up for Grabs at Ultra-Low Mileage.
descriptionSummary: The Porsche Carrera GT embodies the ultimate driving experience. This rare breed of supercar, limited to just over 1,000 units between 2003 and 2007, married a potent V10 engine with an ultralight carbon-fiber frame, delivering breathtaking performance and agility.

title: Ford Focus Could Return in 2027—As an SUV
description: The Ford Focus was one of the Blue Oval's few compact-car successes in the United States, giving U.S. enthusiasts a taste of the crisper handling and styling of the automaker's European products. But Ford's shift in focus (no pun intended) away from cars meant the nameplate was withdrawn from this ...
titleSummary: Ford's Revived Focus Takes Shape: A 2027 Debut as a Crossover Model Anticipated
descriptionSummary: The Ford Focus enjoyed brief but notable success in the US market, bringing a taste of its European heritage - agile handling and stylish design - to American enthusiasts before being phased out as Ford refocused on other priorities.

title: Mercedes' Screen-Obsessed Design Chief Mocks Audi's 'Tiny' Display
description: Gordon Wagener, Mercedes' chief design officer since 2016, isn't known for pulling punches when it comes to automotive design philosophy. The architect behind the brand's controversial Hyperscreen technology, first introduced in the 2021 EQS sedan as a massive 56-inch curved display stretching ...
titleSummary: Audi's Displays Too Small for Luxury Brand, Says Mercedes' Design Director
descriptionSummary: Mercedes' top designer, Gordon Wagener, is infamous for his blunt views on automotive aesthetics. As creator of the divisive Hyperscreen, he brought cutting-edge tech to the masses with the 2021 EQS sedan's groundbreaking 56-inch infotainment system.

title: Why Stellantis Is Backing Off Its 2030 All-Electric Plan
description: The world’s fifth-largest automaker has decided that an all-electric future is not going to happen on the timeline it once promised. Stellantis confirmed that it will no longer pursue its pledge to sell only EVs in Europe by 2030, calling the target unrealistic in today’s market. The move reflects ...
titleSummary: "Stellantis Shifts Gears on Electric Vehicle Ambitions Amid Global Supply Chain Woes"
descriptionSummary: Stellantis, one of the world's leading automakers, has scaled back its ambitious electric vehicle strategy, abandoning its goal to exclusively offer EVs in Europe by 2030 due to what it deems an overly optimistic timeline.

title: That High-Mile Third-Gen 4Runner May Run Forever, But There's A New Way To Make That Happen
description: You could argue this is a little unnecessary given the famed durability of Toyota's 5VZ-FE six-cylinder engine, but one company believes preventative maintenance is the best kind of maintenance, even for a Toyota. LC Engineering out of Arizona is offering a fully rebuilt and refurbished "Stage 1" ...
titleSummary: "4Runner's Endless Road Ahead Gets a Major Boost with Innovative Maintenance Options"
descriptionSummary: Arizona-based LC Engineering offers a premium preventative maintenance solution for Toyota's rugged 5VZ-FE six-cylinder engine, providing a fully rebuilt and refurbished "Stage 1" kit to help extend its lifespan.

title: Nissan Says It Could Fix Traffic By Making Everyone Go The Same Speed
description: Nissan (rightly) points out that the average American spends way too much time in traffic. The company cites a CNBC story that estimates most Americans spend about a week every year in traffic, cumulatively. In light of that, Nissan has some up with a pretty clever way to try and reduce congestion. ...
titleSummary: "Proposal Aims to Simplify City Streets with Uniform, Reduced Speed Limits"
descriptionSummary: Americans waste a significant chunk of their lives stuck in traffic, with many spending nearly a full workweek per year idling away on the road. To combat this, Nissan is pushing an innovative solution to ease congestion.

title: This Crazy Low-Mile Buick Grand National Still Has The Window Sticker Attached To It
description: This '87 Buick Grand National is about as low-mileage a Buick as you'll find. Currently for sale over on Bring a Trailer, the Grand National has just 77 miles on it. The car is so untouched, in fact, that the window sticker is still attached. According to the listing, this Grand National was sold ...
titleSummary: "Low-Miletime Gem: 80s Buick Showroom Spec Grand National with Original Price Tag"
descriptionSummary: This pristine '87 Buick Grand National boasts an astonishingly low 77 miles on the odometer and retains its original window sticker intact. Found on Bring a Trailer, it's a time capsule of a car that's never been driven far from home.

title: Toyota to Build EV SUVs at Kentucky Plant Amid Tariff Pressures
description: Toyota is shifting gears in the U.S. by moving future EV SUV production to its Georgetown, Kentucky facility. The announcement underscores both Toyota’s cautious but deliberate approach to electrification and its response to mounting tariff pressures on imported vehicles. The Georgetown plant, ...
titleSummary: Toyota Invests in Electric Vehicles, Shifting Kentucky Production Amid Trade Uncertainty
descriptionSummary: Toyota is revamping its US strategy with plans to manufacture future electric SUVs at its Georgetown, Kentucky factory. This move reflects the company's measured approach to EV adoption and its efforts to mitigate rising import tariffs.

title: Max Verstappen’s Porsche GT2 Is Hitting the Auction Block
description: If there is one thing that makes the Porsche 911 truly unique, it is the fact that the automaker offers it in a wide range of models and trims for its customers. On one end of the scale, some 911s like the 911 Carrera, GTS, or even the Turbo, can be driven daily and enjoyed for a spirited drive on ...
titleSummary: "Verstappen's Rare Porsche GT2 Hits the Market to Astonish Enthusiasts Everywhere"
descriptionSummary: The Porsche 911's versatility is rooted in its extensive lineup, which caters to diverse driving preferences. Models range from everyday-friendly options to high-performance variants, each offering an exhilarating driving experience tailored to individual tastes.

title: Nissan CEO Hunts for Bold Solutions to Revive Aging Lineup
description: In a new interview with Bloomberg, Nissan CEO Ivan Espinosa stated that the automaker's aging lineup is the next order of business on his agenda to turn around the flailing brand, as it faces the eyes of bad fortune. The new chief executive told the financial publication at Nissan's Yokohama ...
titleSummary: "Nissan's New Leader Seeks Radical Makeover to Ignite Fading Sales"
descriptionSummary: Nissan's CEO, Ivan Espinosa, has identified a key area for improvement: refreshing the company's outdated lineup. In an interview with Bloomberg, he highlighted this as a crucial step in reversing the brand's declining fortunes and putting it back on track.

title: The IIHS Is Making It Tougher to Get a Top Safety Pick+ Award
description: For decades, the Insurance Institute for Highway Safety (IIHS) has been a rigorous body focused on upholding automotive safety, as its comprehensive crash tests and ratings pushed automakers to build stronger and safer vehicles with better structures, airbags, and more sophisticated systems to ...
titleSummary: "IIHS Cracks Down on Safety Standards for Top Honor"
descriptionSummary: The Insurance Institute for Highway Safety has long driven innovation in vehicle safety through its rigorous testing protocols, prompting manufacturers to design more robust and secure cars equipped with advanced features.

title: 2020 Ford Mustang Bullitt for Sale with Just 1,200 Miles
description: When Ford resurrected the Bullitt nameplate in 2019, they created something truly special, a modern interpretation of cinema's most famous muscle car. The attention to detail was impressive, with a Hurst-like cue ball shift knob, six-piston Brembo brakes, and distinctive torque thrust wheels. Most ...
titleSummary: Low-Mileage Legend: Ultra-Rare 2020 Ford Mustang Bullitt Hits the Market
descriptionSummary: Ford revived the legendary Bullitt name in 2019, crafting a unique blend of classic cool and modern muscle. Luxuries like a precision shift knob and high-performance brake calipers elevated this cinema icon for the modern age.

title: Volvo CEO: Cars Will Be Fully Electric Within 10 Years
description: It's been a little over four years since Volvo announced that it would go all-electric by the end of the decade, but the Swedish automaker has already changed its plans. Volvo is now aiming for a mix of all-electric and plug-in hybrid models to comprise 90%-100% of its sales by that time, but its ...
titleSummary: "Volvo's Electric Transformation: A Decade to Zero Emission on Wheels"
descriptionSummary: Volvo's ambitious electric transition plan is shifting gears. Originally set to be fully electrified by the end of the decade, the Swedish automaker now plans for a portfolio of electric and plug-in hybrids to make up 90-100% of its lineup.

title: 2026 Mercedes-Benz Lineup: New CLA, Maybach SL, AMG E 53 Wagon arrive
description: Mercedes-Benz enters the 2026 model year with basically the same lineup for 2025, but with a few notable additions, particularly on the entry-level end. The redesigned 2026 Mercedes-Benz CLA-Class is due to reach dealerships later this year with a first-ever all-electric powertrain and revised ...
titleSummary: Mercedes-Benz Unveils Ambitious 2026 Model Roster with Exciting New Additions
descriptionSummary: For the 2026 model year, Mercedes-Benz introduces several enhancements to its lineup, primarily focusing on its entry-level models. A revamped electric CLA-Class is expected to hit showrooms by year's end, boasting an innovative new all-electric powertrain and updated features.

title: Shell is working on a way to make EV charging faster
description: Shell may be one of the world's largest oil companies, but it also operates a global network of EV charging stations—and it's researching ways to charge cars faster. According to Top Gear, Shell is working with the RML Group—a U.K. motorsports and engineering company whose other projects include a ...
titleSummary: "Shell Speeds Up Electric Car Charging With New Breakthrough Technology Rollout"
descriptionSummary: Shell, one of the world's leading energy companies, has been investing in electric vehicle infrastructure, operating an extensive global network of EV charging stations while developing innovative technologies to accelerate fast-charging capabilities.

title: Audi RS6 Avant Isn’t Escaping the Split Headlight Craze
description: Split headlights have quickly become one of the defining design trends of the past few years, showing up on everything from budget crossovers to high-performance machines. The idea is usually to separate the daytime running lights from the main beams, creating a layered or stacked look – an ...
titleSummary: Audi's Luxurious Wagon Takes a Stylish Leap into Controversial Design Territory
descriptionSummary: Dual-beam headlight designs are now a hallmark of modern automotive styling, appearing on both economy-friendly crossovers and high-powered sports cars alike. This distinctive layout separates low-beam and high-beam functions for a sleek, multi-layered effect.

title: From Vacuums to Bugattis? Dreame’s First Car Render Raises Eyebrows
description: Dreame Auto, the car-making arm of Dreame Technology, has been promising something outrageous ever since it announced plans to enter the EV market. Yes, another tech company that's trying its hand at making cars – really fast ones. Best known for its robot vacuums and compact motors that spin ...
titleSummary: Dreame's Futuristic Leap: Vacuum Maker Tries Its Hand at High-Octane Design
descriptionSummary: Dreame Auto, a subsidiary of Dreame Technology, is making waves with ambitious plans to electrify the automotive scene. The tech giant behind innovative cleaning solutions and precision motors is shifting gears towards high-performance electric vehicles.

title: Mercedes-Benz Kills EQ Branding, Will Just Call EVs “Electric”
description: Speaking to media at the IAA Mobility show in Munich this week, Mercedes-Benz CEO Markus Schäfer confirmed the brand would be ditching its "EQ" moniker currently used for EVs. The automaker has stated that the name is functionally dead, and no further models, like the EQS, using that ...
titleSummary: Mercedes-Benz Ditches EQ Label, Embracing 'Electric' Name for Future Electric Vehicles
descriptionSummary: Mercedes-Benz CEO Markus Schäfer revealed at IAA Mobility in Munich this week that the company will retire its "EQ" branding for electric vehicles, deeming it a redundant label after the latest model launch.

title: Mercedes’ New AMG E53 Hybrid Wagon Underprices Its German Rivals By a Lot
description: Back in April, Mercedes-Benz surprised its American fans with the debut of the AMG E53 Hybrid Wagon. It marked the arrival of a proper low-slung performance wagon to the brand's US lineup, not the lifted crossover with wagon-like pretensions that America currently has. The model was introduced as a ...
titleSummary: Mercedes' Affordable AMG Hybrid Wagon Gives European Competitors a Run for Their Money
descriptionSummary: Mercedes-Benz shook up its American market this spring by unveiling the AMG E53 Hybrid Wagon. This sleek, high-performance estate car finally brings a genuine alternative to the lifted crossovers posing as wagons in the US lineup.

title: 2026 Toyota Land Cruiser Pricing Barely Rises, But Discounts Favor 2025
description: The Land Cruiser's return to the US has been nothing short of successful. After re-entering the market as a boxy, slightly smaller alternative to the full-fat LC, the SUV has quickly proven its appeal. Toyota sold 27,336 units during the first half of 2025, compared to just 3,461 in the same period ...
titleSummary: "Land Cruiser Pricing Holds Steady, but Older Models Get Sweet Deals"
descriptionSummary: Following its highly anticipated return to the US market, the Land Cruiser has seen a remarkable resurgence in popularity. The rugged SUV's unique charm and more compact size have captivated buyers, with sales surging to 27,336 units in the first half of 2025.

title: Is This the 2026 Nissan Sentra's New Design?
description: Nissan sedans, such as the Sentra and Versa in America, have leaned heavily on the current V-Motion grille, first previewed by the Vmotion 2.0 concept in 2017. This signature design element strikes a balance between classy refinement and a touch of sportiness. It's an approach that works across ...
titleSummary: "Exclusive Sighting: Next-Gen Nissan Sentra's Futuristic Facelift Leaked in Photos"
descriptionSummary: Nissan sedans like the Sentra and Versa boast a distinctive front fascia, inspired by the Vmotion 2.0 concept unveiled in 2017. This iconic grille effortlessly blends sophistication with a hint of dynamism, creating a winning design formula.

title: How $1.58 Billion of Tariff Pain is Forcing Mazda to Abandon Small Cars for Big SUVs
description: Much like other automakers, Mazda is navigating one of the trickiest periods in its U.S. history. Despite having more sales than ever, tariffs on imported vehicles have forced the Japanese brand to rethink its lineup, pricing, and production strategies. Mazda projects tariffs will cost $1.58 ...
titleSummary: "Tariffs Shift Gear: Mazda Jumps to Large SUVs as Trade Costs Add Up"
descriptionSummary: Mazda finds itself at a critical juncture in the US market, where rising import tariffs are disrupting long-held business plans. As sales reach record highs, the company is reassessing its product offerings, price points, and manufacturing strategies to mitigate the financial blow.

title: Sorry Tesla, Lyft Is Deploying Its Own Robotaxis
description: For years, Tesla has received considerable public and investor attention regarding the future of self-driving cars, promising services and software like Full Self-Driving and a full-on robotaxi service using bespoke Tesla vehicles, such as the sleek Cybertruck. Before the recent supervised Tesla ...
titleSummary: Lyft Ditches Rideshare for Self-Driving Future with Autonomous Taxi Fleet Launch
descriptionSummary: Tesla's vision for autonomous transportation has been at the forefront of industry chatter, with promises of advanced driver-assist systems like Full Self-Driving and robotaxi services, potentially powered by futuristic vehicles like the Cybertruck.

title: Meet the Cupra Tindaya, the SUV That Shrinks the Urus’ Swagger
description: We all know the Lamborghini Urus as one of the most aggressive-looking SUVs in the market today. It's the poster child of "angry SUV," which makes you forget that we're actually in an era when Lambo has a serious SUV that doesn't look like a military vehicle. The Urus is a supercar on stilts ...
titleSummary: "Meet the Compact Challenger: How Cupra's Tindaya Takes On the Big Boys"
descriptionSummary: The Lamborghini Urus redefines the concept of an aggressive SUV, masking its luxurious underpinnings behind a ferocious exterior. Beneath its rugged façade lies the performance prowess of a supercar, reborn as a high-riding machine.

title: Mercedes EQS Solid-State Prototype Covers 749 Miles on One Charge
description: Range anxiety may have just met its match. Mercedes-Benz has taken an EQS prototype fitted with a solid-state battery on a 749-mile run from Stuttgart to Malmö, and it still arrived with roughly 85 miles left in the pack. The achievement stands as one of the most impressive real-world ...
titleSummary: Mercedes Electric Flagship Sets Long-Distance Record with Impressive Single-Charge Range.
descriptionSummary: Mercedes-Benz has successfully pushed its electric EQS prototype to new limits, completing an 749-mile journey from Stuttgart to Malmö on a single charge using a groundbreaking solid-state battery that still had 85 miles of range left in reserve.

title: Jaguar Land Rover Data Breach: What Owners Need to Know
description: Last week, Jaguar Land Rover announced that a cyber attack had severely disrupted their operations. The company sent staff home while it investigated and paused operations following the attack. Now, the automaker says it believes that some customer data may have been affected by the attack. "As a ...
titleSummary: "Jaguar and Land Rover Owners Hit by Cyber Attack: Your Data at Risk"
descriptionSummary: Jaguar Land Rover recently suffered a significant cyber attack that forced them to shut down operations and send employees home pending an investigation. The company now suspects that sensitive customer information may have been compromised in the breach.

title: McLaren 750S JC96 Brings A Slice Of JGTC History To The Street
description: The McLaren 750S sits at the top of McLaren's current range as its lightest and most powerful series-production supercar. It builds on the brand's reputation for combining track-focused engineering with day-to-day usability, offering agility thanks to its carbon fiber Monocage II chassis and ...
titleSummary: McLaren Unveils Limited-Edition 750S Tribute to Japan's Legendary Racing Heritage
descriptionSummary: The McLaren 750S crowns the manufacturer's lineup, blending razor-sharp performance with everyday practicality. Its ultra-lightweight carbon fiber construction and advanced chassis make it a formidable force on both the track and the road.

title: Lucid’s $50,000 SUV Could Be Tesla and Rivian’s Worst Nightmare
description: Lucid has confirmed plans for a mid-size electric SUV with a starting price of about $50,000, slotting beneath the Gravity, while targeting the Tesla Model Y and upcoming Rivian R2. The teaser image reveals little more than a silhouette, but it signals the start of what could be Lucid’s most ...
titleSummary: Lucid's Luxury Electric SUV Set to Shake Up Rivals with a $50,000 Price Tag
descriptionSummary: Lucid is expanding its lineup with a new electric SUV, priced around $50,000, which will slot below the luxury-focused Gravity model. A teaser image hints at the vehicle's sleek design and targets popular rivals like Tesla's Model Y and Rivian's upcoming R2.

title: The Legend Lives: Toyota Reproduces Engine Components for the AE86
description: Toyota Gazoo Racing (TGR) has announced it will reproduce critical engine components for the Corolla Levin and Sprinter Trueno, better known by fans as the AE86. The move is part of the company’s GR Heritage Parts Project, aimed at keeping some of Toyota’s most iconic models alive on the road ...
titleSummary: "Legacy Revived: Toyota Brings Classic AE86 Engine Parts Back to Life"
descriptionSummary: Toyota Gazoo Racing is reviving a piece of motorsport history with its GR Heritage Parts Project. Critical components for the legendary AE86 Corolla Levin and Sprinter Trueno will be recreated to keep these cult classics running strong.

title: Honda’s 2026 Ridgeline Arrives, but 2025 Models Offer Better Value
description: It has been two decades since the first-generation Honda Ridgeline was introduced in 2005, featuring a design that defied convention. Back then (and still is today), rival midsize trucks are championing body-on-frame construction. Honda leaned into the unibody approach, bringing smoother ride ...
titleSummary: Newer Isn't Always Nicer: Honda's 2025 Ridgeline Outshines Its Sleek 2026 Sibling
descriptionSummary: Two decades ago, Honda disrupted the midsize truck market with the introduction of its first Ridgeline in 2005. Unlike traditional rivals, it employed a innovative unibody design for a more refined driving experience.

title: Meet 'Scorched': The World’s First Full Carbon Fiber Widebody 1969 Mustang
description: If you thought the restomod world had peaked, Trick Rides just raised the bar. The Oklahoma-based builder has unveiled “Scorched,” a 1969 Mustang reimagined with a full carbon-fiber body and widebody proportions. It’s billed as the first ’69 Mustang of its kind, and it’s headed to SEMA as a ...
titleSummary: Carbon Crusader: A Revolutionary 1969 Mustang Transformed with Lightweight, High-Tech Design
descriptionSummary: In a shocking move, Oklahoma's Trick Rides has set a new standard for restomods, unveiling "Scorched," a 1969 Mustang reborn with a revolutionary carbon-fiber body and aggressive widebody design. It's the world's first of its kind, bound for SEMA.

title: Mercedes Design Chief: AI Creates '99% Sh*t Solutions' for Cars
description: AI-rendered cars pollute search results a majority of the time you go looking for pictures of cars via Google Images or similar (DuckDuckGo, by the way, has a filter for AI-generated images if you'd like a cure). Once you learn to spot the yellow-tinted images, it's pretty easy to see just how many ...
titleSummary: "Mercedes Designer Blasts AI's Lackluster Contributions to Car Design Process"
descriptionSummary: A significant portion of car image search results are dominated by artificially generated pictures. While searching on Google Images or similar platforms, many results display telltale signs of AI-rendering, often with a distinct yellow tone.
